inclusion.criterion: Male or females who are 18-80years of age, inclusive at screening
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Female subjects who are post menopausal (i.e >6mnths without menstrual period)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: surgically sterile, or using effective contraceptive measures at visit 0 and the same throughout the study and for 30days after discontinuing treatment
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: No current or previous statin therapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No current indication for statin therapy (Coronary artery disease; hypercholesterolemia, renal dysfunction)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who have given their signed consent to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications for MRI - patients with pacemakers' defibrillators or pacing wires in the heart, or other metal implants such as metal in the eye, brain or spine.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has severe stenosis in the left internal carotid artery and moderate stenosis in the right internal carotid artery. He also has a systolic murmur and plaque in the internal carotid arteries.
